name: All It Takes Short Sleeve Shirt *Nulu™
whyWeMadeThis: Stretch into your practice. This tee provides all the coverage you need for forward folds, with buttery-soft Nulu™ fabric and a cropped length to pair with your favourite yoga tights
careDescription:
Wash With Like Colors
Machine Wash Cold
Do Not Bleach
Tumble Dry Low
Do Not Iron
Do Not Dry Clean
features:
Designed for Yoga
Added Lycra® fibre for stretch and shape retention
Slim fit, cropped length
Asia design edition
fabric: Our buttery-soft Nulu™ fabric feels weightlessly light and is sweat-wicking and four-way stretch

name: MicroPillow™ Tab Run Sock
whyWeMadeThis: We mapped the movement and impact of a runner's foot to create these socks that cushion, hug, and breathe in all the right places
careDescription:
Wash With Like Colors
Machine Wash Cold
Do Not Bleach
Tumble Dry Low
Do Not Iron
Do Not Dry Clean
features:
Designed for Running
Naturally breathable mesh construction in high sweat areas helps keep your feet cool and dry
Light and naturally breathable MicroPillow™ cushioning on the forefoot is zoned for the impact of your stride
Ergonomic cuff protects your ankles from chafing against your shoes as you run
PerformaHeel™ for run uses elasticated yarns to create a shaped fit that hugs your achilles for a locked-in feeling
ErgoToes™ foot-specific design
Reflective detail
Seamless toe construction
Made in Turkey
fabric: The yarn in these socks was treated with No-Stink Zinc™ to inhibit the growth of odour-causing bacteria
